examples: You should take more pride in your appearance.
The President runs the risk of assassination with every public appearance.
It doesn't help our organization's appearance to have a hog in armor parading himself as our leader
The kids were fascinated by the unique appearance of rambutan and eagerly tried it.
When he finally emerged, his disheveled appearance made him look a sight to behold.
words.defineEn: the way that someone or something looks
words.defineVi: cách mà một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó trông

examples: The vibrant green color of perilla leaves adds an attractive touch to any dish.
Guys automatically become less attractive when they break Priscian's head.
The food packaging film had a color retention agent to prevent discoloration and maintain the attractive appearance of it.
The sight of the attractive lifeguard on the beach was enough to make Tom feel like he needed a cold shower to calm his racing heart.
A sinfully attractive man who knows what he wants, Rafael seduces Cherri before she knows what hits her.
words.defineEn: pleasing or appealing to the senses
words.defineVi: làm hài lòng hoặc hấp dẫn các giác quan

examples: Joe Biden also had a role model: Irish, Catholic, good-looking.
I think this is one of the best-looking SUVs available right now, but there is a Range Rover that is pretty good-looking as well.
words.defineEn: someone who has an attractive and pleasing appearance
words.defineVi: một người có vẻ ngoài hấp dẫn và dễ chịu

examples: Handsome, she thought, but not a patch on Alex.
With a wave of her magic wand, she changed the frog into a handsome prince.
He may have been handsome, but that was not enough to make up for his lack of character.
After all, handsome is as handsome does.
After all, handsome is as handsome does.
words.defineEn: (of a man) having an attractive face and body
words.defineVi: (của một người đàn ông) có khuôn mặt và thân hình hấp dẫn

examples: My knowledge of French is pretty basic.
The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The board meeting painted a pretty grim picture.
Those movie stars live pretty high off the hog.
Years of war have left their mark on these pretty islands.
words.defineEn: (of a woman or a child) attractive without being very beautiful
words.defineVi: (của một người phụ nữ hoặc một đứa trẻ) hấp dẫn mà không quá xinh đẹp

examples: The baby had chubby cheeks and a cute face.
They're so chubby and cute.
And cute little kitties.
The smile is pretty cute.
Animals are seriously cute.
words.defineEn: attractive and good-looking
words.defineVi: hấp dẫn và ưa nhìn

examples: He had long, curly eyelashes that framed his eyes.
His hair is curly and brown.
The version of the gene here is allele curly.
Little Doris has curly hair now, and I don't anymore.
So she has the gene right there for curly hair.
words.defineEn: (of hair) having a lot of curls or waves
words.defineVi: (tóc) có nhiều lọn hoặc gợn sóng

examples: Her golden wavy hair fell around her shoulders.
But unlike birds, the cuttlebone’s chambers are supported by wavy walls instead of straight ones.
and whenever I do the math for the differential it's a little bit hand wavy.
The waviness increases up each wall, getting more wavy from floor to ceiling.
For example, some said that wavy lines around the margin of the fossils were tentacles.
words.defineEn: (of hair) having a slight curl or wave to it, creating a soft and gentle appearance
words.defineVi: (tóc) xoăn nhẹ hoặc gợn sóng, tạo vẻ mềm mại và dịu dàng

examples: She guessed the answer straight away.
The guard stood straight as a ramrod.
They clicked straight away.
He gives it to you straight.
Sometimes he spoke straight from the shoulder and sometimes in puzzles
words.defineEn: (of hair) not curly or wavy
words.defineVi: (của tóc) không xoăn hoặc lượn sóng

examples: The appointment of a woman was one in the eye for male domination.
Don't introduce a new male when the hens are sitting.

He always warned his friends to be cautious of women, saying that the female of the species is more deadly than the male and that they should never underestimate a woman's ability to manipulate and deceive.
Many people assume that men are naturally better at sports, but time and time again, female athletes have proven that the gray mare is the better horse, often outperforming their male counterparts.
Do males have pouches?
words.defineEn: relating to men or the male gender
words.defineVi: liên quan đến nam giới hoặc giới tính nam

examples: Seeing flames behind a dune during one of her walks, the female narrator stops in her tracks.
On the credit side of the ledger, the film's female lead offers a remarkably strong character for girls and women of all ages to identify with and look up to.
It is the female birds that build the nests.
Many traditionalists believe that the sporting industry should be predominately for men, and female journalists have endured a lot of criticism for breaking the mold.
Many people assume that men are naturally better at sports, but time and time again, female athletes have proven that the gray mare is the better horse, often outperforming their male counterparts.
words.defineEn: relating to women or the female gender
words.defineVi: liên quan đến phụ nữ hoặc giới tính nữ

examples: It's a blond wig!'
Gabardine pants, blond loafers, drinking beer.
Then he sees the blond wig and the money.
My wife, Janet, she really likes my blond hair, and if it were to go, that could be a problem.
That's some blond hair, isn't it?
words.defineEn: (of hair) pale yellow or gold in color
words.defineVi: (của tóc) màu vàng nhạt hoặc vàng

examples: He's as bald as a eagle.
At his young age, he became bald as an eagle.
Now he has become bald as a coot, with a shiny scalp that catches the sunlight.
Now he's as bald as a cue ball, and he rocks the look with confidence.
After trying various treatments and remedies for his thinning hair, Richard finally embraced his fate and now proudly embraces being as bald as a coot.
words.defineEn: having little or no hair on the head
words.defineVi: có ít hoặc không có tóc trên đầu

examples: Women wore slim dresses that came all the way to their shoes.
It otherwise looks very slim.
It's a slim wallet.
Like, that is a slim keyboard.
There’s a slim margin of time when Hedge can access the paintings.
words.defineEn: thin, in an attractive way
words.defineVi: mỏng, một cách hấp dẫn

examples: Even though he claims to eat a lot, Justin has always been skinny as a toothpick.
After weeks of crash dieting, Jessica's friends noticed that she has become as skinny as a pole.
Jack's obsession with his appearance has led him to become as skinny as a stick, but it's clear that it's taking a toll on his well-being.
John used to have a healthy physique, but ever since he started skipping meals, he has become skinny as a rail.
Jane's little brother, Timmy, has always been skinny as a beanpole, no matter how much he eats.
words.defineEn: having a very low amount of body fat
words.defineVi: có lượng mỡ trong cơ thể rất thấp

examples: The new sofa wouldn't fit into the small living room.
His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
The teacher had a fit when the dog ran through the classroom.
Technology advances by fits and starts.
Replies to the advertisement are arriving in fits and starts.
words.defineEn: healthy and strong, especially due to regular physical exercise or balanced diet
words.defineVi: khỏe mạnh, đặc biệt là do tập thể dục thường xuyên hoặc chế độ ăn uống cân bằng

examples: I heard the tiny squeak of a mouse in the walls.
Cobbled streets run down to a tiny harbor.
The strawberry's bright red skin was dotted with tiny seeds, adding texture to its sweet taste.
It's just a tiny scratch on the car!
We organized a tea party for our dolls with tiny cups and saucers.
words.defineEn: extremely small
words.defineVi: cực nhỏ

examples: he shaved his beard off.
Someone just bearded him in his den.
Today I walked straight into his office and bearded the lion in his den.
I will play Juliet, as soon as I shave my beard.
He had a beard that covered most of his face.
words.defineEn: the hair that grow on the chin and sides of a man’s face
words.defineVi: tóc mọc trên cằm và hai bên mặt của một người đàn ông

examples: The mustache changes everything, man. -
And they have a mustache.
Wipe off my mayonnaise mustache.
Jeff Goldblum got a twirly-q mustache.
And he has a mustache.
words.defineEn: hair that grows or left to grow above the upper lip
words.defineVi: tóc mọc hoặc mọc phía trên môi trên

examples: I had a brush with him a number of years ago.
The chef brushed a sweet glaze made of honey and soy sauce onto the grilled salmon.
We need a new brush for our pet's fur.
She had a brush with stardom in the eighties as a member of a minor pop band.
The hairstylist used a round brush to create curls.
words.defineEn: to arrange or tidy up one's hair with a brush
words.defineVi: để sắp xếp hoặc dọn dẹp tóc của một người với một bàn chải

examples: Both men wore confident smiles.
She smiled nervously.
She had a big smile on her face.
The old gentleman greeted everyone with a warm smile.
His wife smiled, recalling the old saying that a man is a lion in his own cause.
words.defineEn: an expression in which our mouth curves upwards, when we are being friendly or are happy or amused
words.defineVi: một biểu hiện mà miệng của chúng ta cong lên, khi chúng ta thân thiện hoặc vui vẻ hoặc thích thú

examples: The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The food looks good.
The garden looks nice.
Her father looked unhappy.
The house looks east.
words.defineEn: to have a particular appearance or give a particular impression
words.defineVi: để có một sự xuất hiện cụ thể hoặc cho một ấn tượng cụ thể

examples: The book describes her life from cradle to grave.
But the lawyers also described internal politics that at times slowed down the department's work or drove a wedge among members of the team.
And after the match, the Carlisle boss wasn't pulling his punches when describing his players' performance.
BBC is falling over backwards to be impartial by describing this as a crowd!
It was described as a large, luxury mobile home, but there was barely room to swing a cat.
words.defineEn: to give details about someone or something to say what they are like
words.defineVi: để cung cấp thông tin chi tiết về một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó để nói họ như thế nào

examples: There's a lovely park right on our doorstep.
She was a lovely woman and my mother truly enjoyed her company.
I have been as busy as a beaver these last few weeks crocheting up custom orders for some lovely customers.
They’ve let that lovely old house fall to pieces around them.
The rose was pink and had a lovely scent.
words.defineEn: very beautiful or attractive
words.defineVi: rất đẹp hoặc hấp dẫn

examples: Three days later a rash appeared.
Smoke appeared on the horizon.
A bus appeared around the corner.
Two faces appeared at our window.
Small cracks appeared in the wall.
words.defineEn: to seem as if someone or something is being or doing a particular thing
words.defineVi: dường như ai đó hoặc cái gì đó đang hoặc đang làm một việc cụ thể

examples: The clock on my computer screen shows the current time and date.
A white blouse will show the blood.
The photographs clearly show a broken window.
This picture shows my mother as a young woman.
The report showed an increase in sales.
words.defineEn: to make something visible or noticeable
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó có thể nhìn thấy hoặc đáng chú ý

examples: She hides her light under a bushel.
He hid my son's new bicycle until his birthday
Don't hide your light under a bushel.
The cat hid under the table when it heard a loud noise.
She couldn't hide her grimace of disgust when she tasted the spoiled milk.
words.defineEn: to keep out of sight; to prevent from being seen
words.defineVi: để tránh xa tầm nhìn; để tránh bị nhìn thấy
